name: Cancer
effectOnUser: Marijuana can slow growth or cause death in certain types of cancer cells as well as relieve unpleasant side effects by suppressing nausea, increasing appetite, and relieving pain.

name: HIV/AIDS
effectOnUser: Marijuana cacn relieve unpleasant side effects by easing pain and anxiety, reducing inflammation, and improving appetite.

name: Chronic pain
effectOnUser: Marijuana activates the brain's reward system and reduce pain levels.

name: Nausea
effectOnUser: Marijuana can reduce nausea and vomiting due to its antiemetic properties.

name: Muscle spasms/Multiple schlerosis
effectOnUser: Marijuana prevents infllamation and muscle spasms and eases sleep problems.

name: PTSD
effectOnUser: Marijuana reduces and moderates outbursts of traumatic memories and eases anxiety and sleep problems.

name: Stress/Anxiety disorders
effectOnUser: Marijuana can cause a calm or relaxing effect by affecting the neurotransmitter GABA.

name: Eating disorders
effectOnUser: Marijuana can stimulate appetite and help regulate it
